name: 2P games
description:
Download the game or play online here: http://js1k.com/2014-dragons/demo/1933

Take a friend, choose a game, and click alternatively on empty spots to place a piece.

Developed with the help of Subzey.

(This is a version with better graphics. The 1kb version is available here)

Making-of: http://localhost/xem.github.io/articles/#js1k_2pgames

Github: https://github.com/codegolf/2Pgames
